header.title: Community Engagement Platform
header.subtitle: Your Direct Line to Mayor ZOHRAN's Office.

welcomeBanner.title: Your Voice, Our City's Future
welcomeBanner.description: Welcome to the official engagement platform for New York City Residents. Feel Free to Report Community and City wide issues, Track Agendas, and Connect directly with Mayor Zohran's office.

welcomePage.agendaDescription: See the key priorities the Mayor's office is currently working on, from infrastructure to public safety. Track the status of active initiatives.
welcomePage.reportDescription: Spotted an issue in your community? Upload a photo, describe the problem, and submit it directly to the relevant city department.
welcomePage.chatDescription: Have a question or want to discuss a community topic? Engage with the Mayor's office AI assistant for information and to share your feedback.
welcomePage.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to our weekly newsletter for updates on the Mayor's agenda and community events.
welcomePage.footer: Â© {year} New York City Mayor Zohran Kwame Mamdani's Office. All Rights Reserved.
